message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a new approach for generating spatiotemporal representations of videos for the captioning task, which involves developing a novel attention mechanism that adaptively selects features from different layers of CNNs. This work is highly relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) communities, as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) fields. Additionally, the proposed approach involves using adaptive feature abstraction, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
